name: Naventa
goal: Naventa is a belgian professional organisation that groups manufacturers of natural ventilation systems (systems A / A demand controlled, C / C demand controlled) in residential (homes) and non-residential buildings. This organisation is an integral part of Agoria, the federation of the technological industry of Belgium.
euInitiatives:
Energy Efficiency Directive, Renewable Energy Directive, Energy Related Products (Ecodesign)
Nearly Zero Energy Buildings policy
Renovation
Smart Readiness Indicator
